body_html:
To save and restore model just pass the same model_dir into Estimator.

For example:

est = LinearClassifier(model_dir='/tmp/dir1', ...)
est.fit(...)
...
est2 = LinearClassifier(model_dir='/tmp/dir1', ...)
est2.fit(..)
body_text:
To save and restore model just pass the same model_dir into Estimator.
For example:
est = LinearClassifier(model_dir='/tmp/dir1', ...)
est.fit(...)
...
est2 = LinearClassifier(model_dir='/tmp/dir1', ...)
est2.fit(..)
body:
To save and restore model just pass the same `model_dir` into Estimator.

For example:

```
est = LinearClassifier(model_dir='/tmp/dir1', ...)
est.fit(...)
...
est2 = LinearClassifier(model_dir='/tmp/dir1', ...)
est2.fit(..)
```
